channel.title: MoparScape For linux
channel.description:
Hello everyone! I am currently using Ubuntu Linux and i tried to download the linx/mac version off of the topic especially for the linux/mac version and the link seems to be broken.Has anyone came across another download link for moparscape for linux?If so please leave the link hereand i would gladly appreciate it.
Thanks!
